data.name: RPG Maker MZ - Heroine Character Generator 4 for MZ
data.detailed_description:
If you are wishing there was just a little more variation when it comes to the MZ generator and your heroines, well, there is no wishing anymore!

The Heroine Character Generator Pack 4 was optimized for MZ and is ready to add some great pieces to select from for your beautiful female characters. With 38 unique pieces and additional custom battle weapons it will take a while until you run out of options again.

Features:

* Face parts: 66
* SV: 76
* TV: 90
* TVD: 76
* 38 hair and accessory variations
* 1 weapon sheet, includes instructions how to use weapons

Terms of Use:

* This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
* OK to be used in Commercial projects
* Contents can be edited
* OK for use in games with gore
* OK for use in adult-rated games
